name: Image Tools
description: Online image processing and editing tools.

data.name: Online Image Compressor
data.description: Quickly compress image file size to optimize website loading speed.

data.name: Image Format Converter
data.description: Convert between various image formats including JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP and more.

data.name: Online Photo Editor
data.description: Simple online image editor with basic features like crop, resize, filters and more.

data.name: Favicon Generator
data.description: Convert images to ICO format for website favicon or application icons.

data.name: SVG Optimizer
data.description: Optimize SVG vector graphics files to reduce file size and improve performance.
